alert.note: Alert for Franklin (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 23 at 9:11AM EDT until March 23 at 10:15AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Franklin County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 1015 AM EDT. * At 911 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 15 miles southwest of St George Island to 21 miles south of Apalachicola to 34 miles southwest of Eastpoint, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Carrabelle, St George Island, Eastpoint, Apalachicola, Franklin, Carrabelle Beach, Alligator Point, Morgan Place, Saint Teresa, Turkey Point, Royal Bluff, Mcintyre, High Bluff, Yent Place, St George Island St Pk, Green Point, Bay City, Lanark Village, Apalachicola Airport and Creels. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately.
